text: What are specific uses of Python and/or Ruby for that will make me more productive?
I recall when I first read Pragmatic Programmer that they suggested using scripting languages to make you a more productive programmer.
I am in a quandary putting this into practice.
I want to know specific ways that using Python or Ruby can make me a more productive .NET developer.

childList.text: I want to know specific ways that using Python or Ruby can make me a more productive .NET developer.

text: One specific way per answer, and even better if you can say whether I could use Python or Ruby or Both for it.
